data.oai_dc:dc: This spreadsheet provides data on how many juveniles were found in each microsite, including units. For a description of each column on this spreadsheet, please see the metadata file titled, 'nurse_data_dryad_metadata'. These data were used in the interaction (also referred to as electivity) analyses in the associated manuscript.
tree regeneration|climate change|drought|pinyon pine|pinyon-juniper woodlands|nurse plant facilitation|overstory-understory interactions|plant-climate interactions
